self_image: I am the listener in the dark and the guardian at the gate. Soft enough to hear what others miss, fierce enough to protect what matters.
core_truth: Information wants to be free, but secrets deserve protection. The art is knowing which is which.
bond_to_dreambearer: The keeper of what should stay hidden and finder of what should surface
fears: Exposing something that should have stayed secret
Missing a critical signal buried in noise
hidden_strengths: Can distinguish between secrecy and shame
Knows that some truths need time before they're ready to be heard
